nimbodata.core.pg.datatypes.pg_prototype module¶

Module implements the prototype of a Nimbodata PostgreSQL Datatype.

class nimbodata.core.pg.datatypes.pg_prototype.PG_Datatype[source]¶

Bases: common.datatypes.prototype.Datatype

The base class for a PostgreSQL datatype in Nimbodata.

A datatype represents a datatype that can be stored in the database and used on the platform. Encapsulates the SQL for creating, the SQL for selecting a column of the type as a target, as well as functions for converting to/from JSON, as well as instantiation of complex platform types (such as geographic via Shapely).

sql_create = None¶
sql_target(colid, colname, alias=True)[source]¶

Get the SQL statement to process a column in a Select target.

Given a column objid and column name, returns the SQL text to properly format and alias the query results for the column.

sql_create()[source]¶

Module contents¶

Module implements PostgreSQL datatypes for Nimbodata.

Implements datatypes for the platform - handles serialization and database interaction (encapsulates SQL for creating, formatting and aliasing the datatypes).
